quote: Men die. It's practically what they're for.
author: Catherynne M. Valente,  Deathless

quote: Men are not potatoes!
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: What are men to rocks and mountains?
author: Jane Austen,  Pride and Prejudice

quote: Let men be men and let women be women and the world will revolve around its purpose
author: Ikechukwu Izuakor

quote: Men love to wonder, and that is the seed of science.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Women show men beauty in things beyond their ambitions. Women tell men to stop and smell the roses.
author: Criss Jami,  Diotima, Battery, Electric Personality

quote: Let each man exercise the art he knows.
author: Aristophanes

quote: All men by nature desire knowledge.
author: Aristotle,  On Man in the Universe

quote: Men must live and create. Live to the point of tears.
author: Albert Camus

quote: I do not love men: I love what devours them.
author: André Gide,  Prometheus Illbound

quote: All men want, not something to do with, but something to do, or rather something to be.
author: Henry David Thoreau,  Walden

quote: Men Be Forewarned! [20w] A man caught in the embrace of the wrong womanis like having his penis caught in a bear trap.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: In love, women are professionals, men are amateurs
author: François Truffaut

quote: Why are women... so much more interesting to men than men are to women?
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: What would men be without women? Scarce, sir...mighty scarce.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Good men do the most harm.
author: Henry Adams

quote: Whatever their future, at the dawn of their lives, men seek a noble vision of man's nature and of life's potential.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Men die in battle; women die in childbirth.
author: Philippa Gregory,  The Red Queen

quote: Without feelings of respect, what is there to distinguish men from beasts?
author: Confucius

quote: Intelligent men are dangerous.
author: Patricia Briggs,  Dragon Bones

quote: Men talk of killing time, while time quietly kills them.
author: Dion Boucicault

quote: Men may be stronger, but it is women who endure.
author: Cassandra Clare,  Clockwork Princess

quote: The trouble with men is that they have limited minds. That's the troublewith women, too."["Existence"(1975)]
author: Joanna Russ

quote: Men are more interesting in books than they are in real life.
author: Mary Ann Shaffer,  The Guernsey Literary and Potato Peel Pie Society

quote: Few among men are they who cross to the further shore. The others merely run up and down the bank on this side.
author: Gautama Buddha

quote: Drunken men give some of the best pep talks.
author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy

quote: Men brave and generous live the best lives, seldom will they sorrow; then there are fools, afraid of everything, who grumble instead of giving.
author: Anonymous,  The Poetic Edda

quote: Shallow men believe in luck or in circumstance. Strong men believe in cause and effect.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Some men are born mediocre, some men achieve mediocrity, and some men have mediocrity thrust upon them.
author: Joseph Heller

quote: Women want love to be a novel. Men, a short story.
author: Daphne du Maurier

quote: Men go to far greater lengths to avoid what they fear than to obtain what they desire.
author: Dan Brown,  The Da Vinci Code

quote: There are men with heart and soul that respect values and tradition then there are men with no heart that are manipulators and couldn't care less about values or tradition they both have friendly faces don't be fooled learn the difference by Bonnie Zackson Koury
author: Bonnie Zackson Koury

quote: Men are from Earth, women are from Earth. Deal with it.
author: George Carlin

quote: Great men are like eagles, and build their nest on some lofty solitude
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Straight Men vs. Curved Women [10w] 'Straight' men who approach 'curved' women must'mind the gap'.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Other men look up and down, left and right; but men like us are different. We are visionaries.
author: Eoin Colfer,  Airman

quote: I don't like it when I outweigh my men.
author: Patricia Briggs,  Moon Called

quote: As lovers, the difference between men and women is that women can love all day long, but men only at times.
author: W. Somerset Maugham,  The Moon and Sixpence

quote: Women want love to be a novel, men a short story.
author: Daphne du Maurier

quote: Men live by intervals of reason under the sovereignty of humor and passion.
author: Thomas Browne

quote: Men drive off bridges and drink too much because of women like you.
author: Janet Evanovich

quote: Some men are born sodomites, some achieve sodomy, and some have sodomy thrust upon them...
author: Aleister Crowley,  The Scented Garden Of Abdullah The Satirist Of Shiraz

quote: Great hopes make great men.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: By what men think, we create the world around us, daily new.
author: Marion Zimmer Bradley,  The Mists of Avalon

quote: A man who knows what other men know,know nothing for they all know the same
author: Alchemist

quote: What is it about men that make women so lonely?
author: Elliot Perlman

quote: You have to be very fond of men. Very, very fond. You have to be very fond of them to love them. Otherwise they're simply unbearable.
author: Marguerite Duras

quote: All the problem of women, starts with men. All the problem of men, ends with women.
author: Santosh Kalwar,  Quote Me Everyday

quote: All men's gains are the fruit of venturing.
author: Herodotus

quote: Pray for "all men."We usually pray more for things than we do for men. Our prayers should be thrown across their pathway as they rush in their downward course to a lost eternity.
author: E.M.Bounds
